name: Hero Go
description: "Heroes~!!" Three beauty girls broke into a fantastic world. in here they meet a lot of heroes and villains whom from other game worlds. Through continuous training their own companions, to make them more stronger, more reliable until conquer the universe! join this fantastic adventure trip quickly.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 or greater Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+ DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
